verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a new heartbeat
Coming from this nation,
A new heartbeat, tuned in to creation,
A new heartbeat, coming from every street.
It's steady in its cry for the Sons to be released,
Steady in its cry for the Sons to be released,
Steady in its cry for the Sons to be released,
Steady in its cry for the Sons to be released...
